text: Ee Mungu Nguvu Yetu ("Oh, Deus de Toda a Criação!") é o hino nacional do Quénia.J Simon (2012). Kenya the Beloved. Xlibris Corporation. p. 157. ISBN 978-1-4771-3611-9.The Diagram Group, (2013). Encyclopedia of African Peoples. Routledge. p. 243. ISBN 978-1-135-96334-7. == Letra em Kiswahili == Ee Mungu nguvu yetu Ilete baraka kwetu Haki iwe ngao na mlinzi Natukae na undugu Amani na uhuru Raha tupate na ustawi. Amkeni ndugu zetu Tufanye sote bidii Nasi tujitoe kwa nguvu Nchi yetu ya Kenya tunayoipenda Tuwe tayari kuilinda. Natujenge taifa letu Ee ndio wajibu wetu Kenya istahili heshima Tuungane mikono pamoja kazini Kila siku tuwe nashukrani. Categoria:Símbolos do Quênia Quênia
title: Ee Mungu Nguvu Yetu
